name: Let's Get Digital!
description:
Create your own digital narrative out of academic work! Through this tutorial you can transform your Arts and Humanities essays into playable texts as you follow along and make your own interactive essay using Twine. You will learn some introductory HTML coding skills and gain some helpful essay-writing hints. Bring your academic scholarship into the digital realm!

This tutorial is a companion to the Digital Storytelling in Academia and Beyond website which was created as part of the Stories in Play Initiative (SIPI).
